property.name: currentPosition (port)
property.value: ({names:["JSON"]}) The current position of the robot that is searching, typically { "x": 0, "y": 0}.

property.name: noiseSigma (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["number"]}) A measurement of how noisy the signal is (?). Default is 2.0.

property.name: intruderKey (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) The key of the intruder in the key/value store.

property.name: storeLocation (parameter)
property.value: undefined The URL of the key/value store. The type of this parameter is general so that in Ptolemy the value can be a Ptolemy parameter so that multiple instances of the actor can be easily configured.
